name: Bow Boy
description:
Description

Climb a mountain and shoot a bow. Since this was made for the Retrograde Jam 2, it was inspired by Kid Icarus, but I didn't wanna make any enemies. So I didn't and focused on the platforming aspect. 

There is a bonus 4th level if you leave the 3rd level through the hidden exit

Controls

WASD / Arrows - Move

Space / Right Click - Jump

Enter / Left Click - Shoot

R - Reload the room from last checkpoint

ESC - Quit to title
developers: Duck In A Top Hat Games
